description:
Lightweight warmth that's designed to move. Whether you're in the frontcountry, backcountry, or anywhere in between, the Quickdraw Fleece top locks in body heat for comfort on the trail. Elongated sleeves and an articulated fit move with you when you're reaching for faraway holds or setting up your tent. The light and warm recycled fleece is useful year-round, from cutting the chill after the summer sun turns in, to layered under your shell on winter adventures.

  • Polartec® Classic 100 microfleece is lightweight and warm
  • Half-length front zip and a tall collar provide coverage and ventilation options
  • Underarm gusset and articulated sleeves for unrestricted range of motion
  • Flatlock seams for chafe-free wear
name: MEC Quickdraw Micro Fleece Half Zip - Men's
